content:
Image Prompt:

CLIP keywords: Sad, Love, Split-screen, Blue

danbooru keywords: Joseph\_Gordon-Levitt, Zooey\_Deschanel, (500)\_Days\_of\_Summer

Visual Artist: Edward Hopper

Artistic Style: Realism

Art Technique: Oil Painting

Description: An oil painting inspired by the movie poster of "(500) Days of Summer" in the style of Edward Hopper's realism. The painting depicts a split-screen design, with Joseph Gordon-Levitt on the left side looking happy and in love with Zooey Deschanel. On the right side, he is seen sitting alone on a bench, looking sad and heartbroken with an empty space beside him. The background is painted in shades of blue, with a cityscape visible in the distance. The oil painting technique is used to capture the realistic textures of the scene, from the folds in the characters' clothing to the roughness of the bench. The painting is an emotional portrayal of the highs and lows of love, echoing the themes of the movie.
